content: Investments Coffee Meets Investing Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Jul 2018Can I do DCA (dollar-cost averaging) on REITs ETF instead of investing into 2 or more REITs?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

HC TangLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 09 Jul 2018Yes you can but the fees (in $ not % for some) is not worth doing DCA on monthly basis. Most suggest a quaterly or half yearly basis so the volume is larger and more justifiable for the fees. ​Can read $$$ KPO blog to understand a little about REITS ETF: https://kpo-and-czm.blogspot.com/search?q=REIT+ETF​​0 comments2
I-Min ChuaLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 20 Jul 2018Yes you can. but the cost will be higher. there is a management fee with REITs ETF0 comments1
